column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////They do a good job of getting you to pre-order your pizza while you wait for a table. One would assume this means hot pizza. After waiting an hour and fifteen minutes we got a cold pizza. Our server told us he'd see what he could do
column2: then returned five minutes later saying they'd taken the pizza off the bill. Okay
column3: but the pizza was still cold. We asked that they maybe heat the pizza
column6: it tasted alright. Wouldn't go back as it wasn't exactly stellar
column7: even for free pizza. The house salad was meh.
